message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
Not bad, but I was hoping for more. Let's see if we can do better.
A slight adjustment from my previous offer. Will you meet me here?
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not budging much
Too lopsided. I'm not willing to give up that much more.
A bit more balanced, but still a good deal for me. Will you reconsider?
I'm starting to get a bit more aggressive, Alice
Not a chance. I'm not getting taken advantage of like this.
I'm not giving up yet. Meeting you halfway, but I need a better deal.
I'm taking a firmer stance, Alice. You're getting a smaller share
No way. I'm not going to get taken advantage of like this. I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up. Meet me here, or I'll walk away with nothing.
This is my last offer. Take it or leave it
No way. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept such a lopsided deal. Bring on the next round!
This is my last chance to get a decent deal. Will you meet me here?
I'm taking it all. You had your chances
No way. I'd rather get nothing than let you take everything. Game over.
